original_text: Consider him who endured from sinners such hostility against himself, so that you may not grow weary or fainthearted.
korean_text: 너희가 피곤하여 낙심하지 않기 위하여 죄인들이 이같이 자기에게 거역한 일을 참으신 이를 생각하라

sentences.original_text: who endured from sinners such hostility against himself
sentences.korean_translation: 죄인들에게서 자신을 향한 그런 적대감을 견디신 분을

sentences.original_text: so that you may not grow weary
